resources:
OPSC_POE Welcome to CreateActivity Help 

Create Activity Page is where you will create new activities, where you are required to enter name, description, category, and an image to create a new Activity Welcome to CreateGoal Help 

Create Goal Page is where you will create goals to your inputted activity, you will need to select hours and a time frame Create Goal Help Create Activity Help Welcome to SignUp Help 

Here you are required to enter Username and Password to create an account with us to access our application Sign Up Help Activity Name, Description, Category, Number of Logs, Total Hours Logged (Hours), Maximum Goal Interval, Maximum Goal (Hours), Maximum Goal Remaining Time (Hours), Minimum Goal Interval, Minimum Goal (Hours), Minimum Goal Remaining Time (Hours) Activity Name, Hours Logged, Date Logged userLogData.csv userActivityData.csv activityIDIndex Error Stopwatch Input Hours Input Error Cannot have 0 hours. Please set the amount of hours or use the stop watch to time an activity dd-MM-yyyy Start Stop %02d:%02d:%02d categoryIDIndex Activity Total Hours: previousScreen Category_View currentDataID CurrentActivity Daily Weekly Monthly currentGoalIDIndex Edit Create_Goal No Categories Available Add a category from the home page Create Category Needed .jpg All input fields required Please enter an activity description Please enter an activity name Create_Activity Camera is not available data #%06X 01-01-1900 .provider text/csv Share using... Up Down Left Right Left_Half Right_Half List Category No date in this time period No category selected Category Totals Logs No Logs Exist Go to an activity to add a log LogsData Hours Logged
